nodes.text: Dargulli was a planet in the Kether system in the Inner Rim.

In 1 BBY, Darth Vader was lured to Dargulli by rumors of a Jedi Knight operating on the planet. Bounty hunter Boba Fett was on the planet at that time, and was able to help Vader when he was ambushed by local bounty hunters bent on making a name for themselves. With the aid of Fett, Vader eliminated all of his attackers, only to be approached by a Human woman with a lightsaber. She tried to convince Darth Vader to take her on as a Sith apprentice but Vader killed her instead.
